children.text: In this step you are taking ownership of what is happening, you stop things from happening to you or happening around you.  This is good in and of itself, but it also leads us into our second step.

As you do this you will most likely be very uncomfortable.  By making someone (in this case you) the actor, you will feel the need to explain why you want such things.  This is great! lean into and...
In step two we want to go ahead and justify your want, tell someone why you want what you do.
